1. Over 22,000 Pounds Of Ground Beef Recalled For Possible E. Coli In Several States  Delish
  2. Enormous ground beef recall issued over deadly E. coli contamination risk across three states  Fox Business
  3. Over 20,000 Pounds of Ground Beef Recalled Over E. Coli Contamination  People.com
  4. USDA Announces Ground Beef Recall in 3 States—Nearly 23,000 Pounds of Meat May Contain E. Coli  Health: Trusted and Empathetic Health and Wellness Information
  5. Ground beef shipped to 3 states, including Oregon, recalled due to E. coli contamination  OregonLive.com

item.title: Microsoft AI chief gives it 18 months—for all white-collar work to be automated by AI - Fortune
item.description:
1. Microsoft AI chief gives it 18 months—for all white-collar work to be automated by AI  Fortune
  2. Microsoft AI CEO predicts 'most, if not all' white-collar tasks will be automated by AI within 18 months  Business Insider
  3. Mustafa Suleyman plots AI ‘self-sufficiency’ as Microsoft loosens OpenAI ties  Financial Times
  4. Microsoft AI CEO: Virtually All White Collar Tasks Will Be Automated Within a Year and a Half  Futurism
  5. Promises are cheap  Marcus on AI | Gary Marcus | Substack
